title.rendered: Key information relating to the cash dividend to be paid by AqualisBraemar

content.rendered:
Oslo, Norway – May 8, 2020:

The Board of Directors has decided to propose for the Annual General Meeting a dividend for the fiscal year 2019 of NOK 0.20 per share.

Dividend Amount: NOK 0.20 per share
Declared currency: NOK
Last day including right: 10 June 2020
Ex-date: 11 June 2020
Record date: 12 June 2020
Payment date: On or about 24 June 2020
Date of approval: 10 June 2020

For further information, please contact:

Investors and financial media

Kim Boman, CFO, AqualisBraemar ASA
Telephone: +47 959 63 91

Other media enquiries

Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
Telephone: +47 41 61 06 05
Email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

About AqualisBraemar ASA

AqualisBraemar ASA (OSE: Aqua) is a public listed company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers adjusting, marine, offshore and renewables consultancy services to the energy, shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 48 offices located across 5 continents in 31 countries. AqualisBraemar ASA operates under three distinct brands globally:

  • AqualisBraemar: a leading adjusting, marine and offshore consultancy to the energy, shipping and insurance industries
  • AqualisBraemar Yacht Services: a specialised marine consultant to the superyacht market
  • OWC: an independent consultancy to the offshore renewables sector

This press release may include “forward-looking statements”. These statements may be identified by the use of words like “anticipate”, “believe”, “estimate”, “expect”, “intend”, “may”, “plan”, “project”, “will”, “should”, “seek” and similar expressions and may refer to, amongst other topics, capital expenditure, cash flows, costs, growth, performance, profits, sales, acquisitions, and strategy. Any such statements reflect our views as of the date made and are subject to risks and uncertainties. We disclaim any responsibility to update forward-looking statements.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dividend approval and Ex-date
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Annual General Meeting in AqualisBraemar ASA, held 10 June 2020 at 11am, approved the board proposal of distributing a dividend of NOK 0.20 per share.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Board approves 2019 annual financial statements
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Board of Directors of AqualisBraemar ASA has approved the consolidated financial statements, the parent company's financial statements and the Board of Directors' report for 2019.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ex-dividend NOK 0.20 today
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The shares in AqualisBraemar ASA will be traded ex-dividend NOK 0.20 as from today, 2 November 2020.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Key information relating to the cash dividend to be paid by Aqualis ASA
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Asker, Norway - June 20, 2018 After trading through a difficult market in 2015 and 2016, Aqualis has delivered positive adjusted EBIT every quarter since the start of 2017. The revenue grew by 13% in 2017 compared with 2016 and the associated growth in working capital has been financed through…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ex-dividend NOK 0.20 today
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The shares in AqualisBraemar ASA will be traded ex-dividend NOK 0.20 as of today, 11 June 2020. This information is subject to the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.
